00037 class SpeTaskImage {
00039         ctk_spe_task_image_t m_image;
00040 
00041         friend class SpeTask;
00042 
00043         void release() {
00044             if (m_image != NULL && ctk_spe_task_image_release(m_image) <= 1) {
00045                 /* the image can be destroyed */
00046                 ::ctk_elf_free_load_image((void*)(unsigned long)
00047                     m_image->load_image);
00048                 ::ctk_task_free_align((void*)m_image);
00049                 m_image = NULL;
00050             }
00051         }
00052 
00053     public:
00055         SpeTaskImage() : m_image(NULL) { }
00056 
00058         SpeTaskImage(SpeImage &image) {
00059             int ret = ::ctk_spe_task_image_create(&m_image, image.getProgram());
00060             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00061                 throw Error(ret);
00062             ctk_spe_task_image_add_ref(m_image);
00063         }
00064 
00066         SpeTaskImage(const char *fname) {
00067             SpeImage image(fname);
00068             int ret = ::ctk_spe_task_image_create(&m_image, image.getProgram());
00069             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00070                 throw Error(ret);
00071             ctk_spe_task_image_add_ref(m_image);
00072         }
00073 
00075         SpeTaskImage(ctk_spe_program_t &program) {
00076             int ret = ::ctk_spe_task_image_create(&m_image, &program);
00077             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00078                 throw Error(ret);
00079             ctk_spe_task_image_add_ref(m_image);
00080         }
00081 
00083         SpeTaskImage(const SpeImage &image) {
00084             int ret = ::ctk_spe_task_image_create(&m_image, 
00085                 image.getProgram());
00086             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00087                 throw Error(ret);
00088             ctk_spe_task_image_add_ref(m_image);
00089         }
00090 
00092         SpeTaskImage(const ctk_spe_task_image_t &image) {
00093             m_image = image;
00094             if (m_image != NULL) 
00095                 ctk_spe_task_image_add_ref(m_image);
00096         }
00097 
00099         SpeTaskImage(const SpeTaskImage &image) : m_image(image.m_image) {
00100             if (m_image != NULL)
00101                 ctk_spe_task_image_add_ref(m_image);
00102         }
00103 
00105         SpeTaskImage& operator=(const SpeTaskImage &image) {
00106             release();
00107             m_image = image.m_image;
00108             if (m_image != NULL)
00109                 ctk_spe_task_image_add_ref(m_image);
00110             return *this;
00111         }
00112 
00114         virtual ~SpeTaskImage() {
00115             release();
00116         }
00117 };
00118 
00119 class SpeTask {
00120         ctk_spe_task_t m_task;
00121         SpeTaskImage m_image;
00122         int m_flags;
00123         ctk_atomic_ea_t m_counter_ea;
00124 
00125         friend class SpeRuntime;
00126 
00127         void create(SpeTaskImage &image, int flags) {
00128             int ret = ::ctk_spe_task_create_by_image(&m_task, 
00129                             image.m_image, flags);
00130             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00131                 throw Error(ret);
00132             m_task->class_ea = EAADDR(this);
00133             _ctk_atomic_create_local(&m_counter_ea);
00134             _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00135         }
00136 
00137         void release() {
00138             if (m_counter_ea != 0 && _ctk_atomic_dec(m_counter_ea) <= 1) {
00139                 ::ctk_spe_task_destroy(m_task);
00140                 _ctk_atomic_destroy_local(m_counter_ea);
00141                 m_task = NULL;
00142                 m_counter_ea = 0;
00143             }
00144         }
00145 
00146     public:
00148         enum SpeTaskStatus {
00149             INITIALIZED = CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_INITIALIZED, 
00150             QUEUED = CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_QUEUED,     
00151             RUNNABLE = CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_RUNNABLE, 
00152             FINISHED = CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_FINISHED, 
00153         };
00154 
00156         SpeTask() : m_task(NULL), m_counter_ea(0) { }
00157 
00159         SpeTask(SpeImage &image, int flags = 0)
00160             : m_task(NULL), m_image(image), m_flags(flags)
00161         {
00162             create(m_image, flags);
00163         }
00164 
00166         SpeTask(SpeTaskImage &image, int flags = 0)
00167             : m_task(NULL), m_image(image), m_flags(flags)
00168         {
00169             create(m_image, flags);
00170         }
00171 
00173         SpeTask(const char *fname, int flags = 0)
00174             : m_task(NULL), m_image(fname), m_flags(flags)
00175         {
00176             create(m_image, flags);
00177         }
00178 
00180         SpeTask(ctk_spe_program_t &program, int flags = 0)
00181             : m_task(NULL), m_image(program), m_flags(flags)
00182         {
00183             create(m_image, flags);
00184         }
00185 
00188         SpeTask(const ctk_spe_task_t &task) : m_task(task), m_counter_ea(0)
00189         {
00190             if (m_task != NULL) {
00191                 m_flags = task->flag;
00192                 m_image = ((SpeTask *)(unsigned long)task->class_ea)->m_image;
00193                 m_counter_ea = ((SpeTask *)(unsigned long)
00194                                     task->class_ea)->m_counter_ea;
00195                 _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00196             }
00197         }
00198 
00200         SpeTask(const SpeTask &task)
00201             : m_task(NULL), m_image(task.m_image), 
00202               m_flags(task.m_flags)
00203         {
00204             /* creates a new one */
00205             create(m_image, m_flags);
00206         }
00207 
00209         SpeTask& operator=(const SpeTask &task) {
00210             if (m_task == task.m_task)
00211                 return *this;
00212             release();
00213             m_flags = task.m_flags;
00214             m_image = task.m_image;
00215             create(m_image, m_flags);
00216             /*
00217             m_task = task.m_task;
00218             m_flags = task.m_flags;
00219             m_counter_ea = task.m_counter_ea;
00220             if (m_counter_ea != 0)
00221                 _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00222             */
00223             return *this;
00224         }
00225 
00227         virtual ~SpeTask() {
00228             release();
00229         }
00230 
00232         friend bool operator==(const SpeTask &x, const SpeTask &y) {
00233             return (x.m_task == y.m_task);
00234         }
00236         friend bool operator!=(const SpeTask &x, const SpeTask &y) {
00237             return (x.m_task != y.m_task);
00238         }
00239 
00241         int getExitCode() {
00242             int rc, ret = ::ctk_spe_task_get_exit_code(m_task, &rc);
00243             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00244                 throw Error(ret);
00245             return rc;
00246         }
00247 
00248 #ifdef __ALTIVEC__
00249 
00250         template <typename R> R getReturnValue() {
00251             if (m_task == NULL)
00252                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_NULL_OBJECT);
00253             if (m_task->status >= CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_QUEUED &&
00254                 m_task->status < CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_FINISHED) {
00255                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_BAD_TASK_STATUS);
00256             }
00257             return *(R*)&m_task->rc.qwval;
00258         }
00259 #else /* !__ALTIVEC__ */
00260 
00261         template <typename R> R getReturnValue() {
00262             if (m_task == NULL)
00263                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_NULL_OBJECT);
00264             if (m_task->status >= CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_QUEUED &&
00265                 m_task->status < CTK_SPE_TASK_STATUS_FINISHED) {
00266                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_BAD_TASK_STATUS);
00267             }
00268             return (R)(m_task->rc.val64[0] >> ((8 - sizeof(R))*8));
00269         }
00270 #endif /* !__ALTIVEC__ */
00271 
00273         SpeTaskStatus getStatus() {
00274             if (m_task == NULL)
00275                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_NULL_OBJECT);
00276             return (SpeTaskStatus)m_task->status;
00277         }
00278 
00280         int getId() {
00281             if (m_task == NULL)
00282                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_NULL_OBJECT);
00283             return m_task->id;
00284         }
00285 
00287         void *getArg(int index) {
00288             if (m_task == NULL)
00289                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_NULL_OBJECT);
00290             if (index < 0 || index >= 2)
00291                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_OUT_OF_RANGE);
00292             return (void*)(unsigned long)m_task->arg[index];
00293         }
00294 
00296         bool empty() { return (m_task == NULL); }
00297 
00299         void load(const SpeTaskImage &image) {
00300             release();
00301             m_image = image;
00302             create(m_image, m_flags);
00303         }
00304 
00305 }; // class SpeTask

00307 }; // namespace ctk
